p: RHD is characterized by disseminated necrotic hepatitis [ 9]; it evolves peracutely or acutely with high mortality. Prior to death, clinical signs derive from severe disseminated intravascular coagulopathy (DIC), with multi-organ failure [ 10], sometimes with asphyxia, seizures, and intense suffering [ 11]. There is no treatment; vaccination is the only preventive measure, together with the implementation of biosecurity measures [ 12].
